divs: Sighting DetailsHi, i need to talk to some one years ago 4 or 5, i had steriod injections in my back, Doctor, missed were injection was to go, i was in so much pain and blacking out i called 911, they just thought i was on to many pain meds thats why i was having this feeling, i went to lay on my bed pain was worse then i ever had, i should also add im disabled because of the spine injury, and surgery to it, i kept watching this craft as i looked up from my bed, it never left, as i tried to lay down on solfa, when ever i stood up i would loose hearing in both ears, i went back to bed craft was still there, wife couldnt see it only i could, i was praying to God to please help with this very extream back pain, i know doctor missed the pocket the steroid was to go into, as my pain was off the charts, i just wanted it to ease up some or to die, thats how bad it was, i saw craft moving slowly forward no sound at all, at the time i thought it looked like a xmas tree, as i looked up at it thats how pretty it was looking up from underneath, i looked close i saw one alien looking at me from a opening in the craft, he looked friendly, now get this my wifes eyes were open now, we saw 3 or so pale looking white people sitting on the floor, i knew they were alien humanoids, there was like steam comming up from the floor, they said they wanted to help me , would i come sit down here, they pointed to the steam, do to my faith and all the reports of abductions experments ect, i didnt trust them, so i mocked them jumping around the room acting like a freak, and putting on a act like oh no im scared of you, my wife saw everything, they left, the craft left i was back in my bed, i regreat now i didnt let them help me , its just that i didnt trust them, i have alot of faith in God, after they left my pain was so bad i prayed to die, if i had to do over, i would of sat down where they ask me to where the steam was comming up.
